name: Extract blocks by range
description: Extracts blocks of the source array, for which the specified column of the corresponding "selector" contains a number in the specified range. If "selector" is not specified, the column of the source arrays is used as a selector.

in_ports.name: selector
in_ports.hint:
Selector: numbers in the specified column of this array must be in the specified range.
If not set, the source array is used instead.

controls.name: checkedIndexInSelectorBlocks
controls.caption: Index of the checked column in the selector
